titleStmt.title: His Majesties answer to the XIX. propositions of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Colepeper, John Colepeper, Baron, d. 1660.
Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The humble petition and advice of both Houses of Parliament, with XIX propositions, and the conclusion. Sent unto his Majestie, the second of June, 1642.
According to Clarendon (Life (1857) v.1, p.130-31), the answer was actually written by Sir John Colepeper and Viscount Falkland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And
